DifficultyDef.label: Some challenge
DifficultyDef.description: For players on their first game, or casual players who still want a challenge. Threats are dangerous but not brutal.

DifficultyDef.label: Intense
DifficultyDef.description: A significant challenge. Succeeding at this level requires a solid and well-rounded understanding of survival strategies, and some luck.

DifficultyDef.label: Extreme
DifficultyDef.description: As hard as a diamond-bladed dagger. Enemies are strong, prices are poor, food is scarce, and colonists are grumpy. For those who enjoy digital suffering.
